synopsis.text: The body of a young woman, gunned down on a tempestuous night, is discovered floating in the waters beneath a cliff, sparking a manhunt for her last known companion. Coincidentally, this man is also sought for the murder of a local yakuza in a bar. Amidst this chaos, a private investigator named Goro is hired by the man's estranged wife, who seeks to find her husband before the police do. Teaming up with a law enforcement officer harboring his own motives, Goro embarks on a chilling journey riddled with tragedy and intrigue, aiming to unravel the enigmatic connection between the murders and the missing husband. As the clues unravel, Goro finds himself entangled in a bizarre psychological mystery that promises to keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
